title: Find out how Expat works!
subtitle: Don't worry, we'll take care of everything.

destination.title: Choose you destination
destination.description: You can choose among more than 50 countries, you will find your happiness to study on a long term basis

services.title: Select your services
services.description: We offer various services to facilitate your departure: obtaining a visa, finding your accommodation, insurance, follow-up with an ambassador...

cart.title: Validate your cart
cart.description: Once you have selected your services, proceed to payment in order to obtain an appointment with a consultant who will follow you throughout your adventure.

trip.title: Follow the progress of your journey
trip.description: Thanks to our advanced and complete tracking, be informed of the progress of your steps to be a real actor in your expatriation project.

documents.title: Get your documents
documents.description: Everything is ready! All you have to do is receive the documents you need to leave with peace of mind.

enjoy.title: Enjoy your Expat trip
enjoy.description: You can finally go to your host country and enjoy your studies abroad without worries, thanks to Expat Facilities.
